days.title: Zoology - The Study of Animals
days.learning_objective: Explore animal behavior while understanding how zoological knowledge informs conservation, animal welfare, and biomimetic technology.

days.title: Ecology - How Environments Work
days.learning_objective: Model ecological systems while understanding how ecological thinking applies to social systems, economic networks, and sustainable technology.

days.title: Dance - Movement as Expression
days.learning_objective: Practice embodied expression while understanding how dance enables cultural preservation, physical health, and social bonding.

days.title: Optics - How Light Behaves and Bends
days.learning_objective: Understand optical physics while exploring how light manipulation enables fiber optic communication, medical lasers, and quantum computing applications.

days.title: Technological Innovation - Pushing the Boundaries
days.learning_objective: Practice innovation methodology while understanding how responsible technology development balances progress with ethical considerations and social impact.

days.title: Conservation Biology - Protecting Life on Earth
days.learning_objective: Understand biodiversity protection while exploring how conservation science informs policy, sustainable development, and international cooperation.

days.title: Negotiation Skills - Finding Win-Win Solutions
days.learning_objective: Practice collaborative problem-solving while understanding how principled negotiation enables conflict resolution, democratic deliberation, and international diplomacy.

days.title: Biochemistry - The Chemistry of Life
days.learning_objective: Explore molecular biology while understanding how biochemical knowledge enables medicine, biotechnology, and sustainable materials development.

days.title: Developmental Biology - How Organisms Grow
days.learning_objective: Understand biological development while exploring how developmental science informs regenerative medicine, educational theory, and ethical considerations.

days.title: Theater - Live Performance Art
days.learning_objective: Practice public expression while understanding how theater enables social commentary, empathy building, and democratic dialogue through storytelling.

days.title: Acoustics - The Science of Sound and Hearing
days.learning_objective: Understand sound physics while exploring how acoustic knowledge enables communication technology, architectural design, and accessibility improvements.

days.title: Lean Methodology - Efficient Innovation
days.learning_objective: Practice process improvement while understanding how lean thinking enables sustainable production, waste reduction, and democratic organizational structures.

days.title: Taxonomy - Organizing Life's Diversity
days.learning_objective: Understand classification systems while exploring how systematic thinking enables scientific communication, data organization, and knowledge management.

days.title: Density and Buoyancy - Why Some Things Float and Others Sink
days.learning_objective: Model fluid physics while understanding how density principles enable ship design, aviation technology, and materials engineering.

days.title: Ethology - Animal Behavior Science
days.learning_objective: Understand behavioral evolution while exploring how ethological knowledge informs conservation, animal welfare, and human behavioral insights.

days.title: Paleontology - Life from the Past
days.learning_objective: Explore deep time and evolution while building scientific literacy about evidence-based reasoning and climate change patterns.

days.title: Film Making - Storytelling Through Moving Pictures
days.learning_objective: Practice visual storytelling while understanding how cinema enables cultural exchange, social documentation, and democratic discourse.

days.title: Crystallography - The Geometry of Minerals
days.learning_objective: Understand crystal structures while exploring how crystallography enables materials science, drug development, and technological miniaturization.

days.title: Open Source Innovation - Collaborative Creation
days.learning_objective: Practice collaborative development while understanding how open source principles enable democratic innovation, knowledge sharing, and technological sovereignty.

days.title: Astrobiology - The Search for Life Beyond Earth
days.learning_objective: Explore possibilities of extraterrestrial life while understanding how astrobiology research drives technological innovation and international cooperation.

days.title: Capillary Action - How Liquids Climb
days.learning_objective: Understand surface forces while exploring how capillary physics enables plant biology, medical devices, and microfluidics technology.

days.title: Biotechnology - Using Life to Solve Problems
days.learning_objective: Explore biological applications while understanding how biotechnology can address global challenges while requiring ethical oversight and equitable access.

days.title: Genetic Engineering - Editing the Code of Life
days.learning_objective: Understand gene editing while exploring the transformative potential and ethical implications of genetic technology for medicine and agriculture.

days.title: Creative Writing - Crafting Stories and Poems
days.learning_objective: Practice narrative expression while understanding how storytelling enables cultural preservation, social commentary, and empathy building.

days.title: Plasma Physics - The Fourth State of Matter
days.learning_objective: Explore high-energy physics while understanding how plasma science enables fusion energy, space technology, and advanced manufacturing.

days.title: Disruptive Innovation - Ideas That Change Everything
days.learning_objective: Understand innovation patterns while exploring how disruptive technologies can either democratize or concentrate power depending on their governance.

days.title: Stem Cells - The Body's Repair Kit
days.learning_objective: Explore regenerative biology while understanding how stem cell research raises ethical questions about medical applications and research oversight.

days.title: Parasitology - Nature's Freeloaders
days.learning_objective: Understand parasitic relationships while exploring how parasitology informs public health, agriculture, and ecological balance.

days.title: Aging Process - How Life Changes Over Time
days.learning_objective: Understand biological aging while exploring how gerontology research affects healthcare policy, social support systems, and end-of-life ethics.

days.title: Nutrition Science - Fueling the Body
days.learning_objective: Apply nutritional knowledge while understanding how food science informs public health policy, agricultural practices, and global food security.

days.title: Poetry - The Art of Condensed Expression
days.learning_objective: Practice linguistic creativity while understanding how poetry enables cultural expression, social critique, and cross-cultural communication.
